# Project Structure Prompts

## Adding New Projects

```prompt
Create a new test project named [ProjectName].Tests in the tests directory with reference to [ProjectName] in the src directory. Include a basic test setup and dependencies for xUnit.
```

```prompt
Create a new Aspire AppHost project in the infrastructure directory with the name [ProjectName].AppHost. Configure it to reference the projects in the src directory.
```

```prompt
Create a new ServiceDefaults project in the infrastructure directory that sets up standard middleware and configuration for all services.
```

```prompt
Create a new class library project in the src directory named [ProjectName].[ModuleName] with standard folder structure for models, services, and interfaces.
```
